title: Breaking Dawn by Stephenie Meyer (Twilight Saga)
description:
Breaking Dawn by Stephenie Meyer.

The 4th and last book of the Twilight Saga. <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/Breaking-Dawn-Twilight-Saga-Book/dp/031606792X" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/Breaking-Dawn-Twilight-Saga-Book/dp/031606792X</a>

Released August 2nd, 2008.

--------------

The book is properly formatted and in .pdf format. Made by converting the .lit release to .pdf and fixing all the formatting errors, to make it look like the actual book instead of just a txt file. There is still the occasional missing space and extra line-break, but nothing that makes it unreadable.

Love,
The Twatfairy

---------------

Here's the same file uploaded to a couple of file sharing sites. Download and share! No one should have to pay for this book.
